value:
$WmMPID_総選挙クロード,ch17_04_Claude_M_ELECTION01,Face|It may not be what I had hoped for...
But it's time to move forward, right?$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_フロージ,ch00_26_Froda_M_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Dream-King Freyr, please cheer
up, won't you?$k$p$EFace|It's going to be all right. I'm sure
my brother will come up with
a good idea soon!$k$p$WmMPID_フロージ,ch00_26_Froda_M_Normal,Face|I am sorry. Truly, I am...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Just leave it to us! The Order of
Heroes has helped all manner
of realms in crisis before!$k$p$WmMPID_フロージ,ch00_26_Froda_M_Normal,Face|Realms in crisis... As you say...$k$pIf a crisis befell the dream realm...
A crisis that promised to put all
the realm to ruin...$k$pSuch a crisis would cause the hope
in hearts everywhere to fade...$k$pYou mortals would do whatever
it took...to save this realm, would
you not?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Of course we would! We would
do everything in our power!$k$p$WmMPID_フロージ,ch00_26_Froda_M_Normal,Face|Even if...it meant you could never
return to your own world?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|...What do you mean?$k$p$WmMPID_フロージ,ch00_26_Froda_M_Normal,Face|Only a child can save the realm
of dreams—and the hope in mortal
hearts—from ruin...$k$pBut anyone who drinks of the dream
nectar will no longer be mortal...$k$p...And they will never again be able
to return home.$k$pTo lose a home... That is a very
cruel thing. I could not allow it
forced upon anyone...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Dream-King Freyr, I—$k$p$WmMPID_フロージ,ch00_26_Froda_M_Normal,Face|But we had an idea... I do not recall
which of us first suggested it, but
I am not without blame...$k$pWe thought, "What if a child had no
home to return to? ...No family that
loved them? No family to miss them."$k$pThe mortal realm would mean little
more than pain to them.$k$pFor those children to drink the
nectar... To choose to live within
the realm of dreams...$k$pWould that not be a better life
for them?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|...$k$p$WmMPID_フロージ,ch00_26_Froda_M_Normal,Face|A mortal princess lost her way...
in a twist of fate... She should
never have been involved...$k$pBut once the gate to the dream
realm was opened...it was already
too late...$k$pTo keep the realm from ruin, we
gave the children the nectar...$k$pWe thrust the mantle of Hero onto
innocent children...and we sacrificed
them to save everything...$k$p$Sbs150|
